dregsmod:Adaptability.NAME: Adaptability
dregsmod:Adaptability.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse, gain !M! Block.
dregsmod:Adaptability.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Whenever you draw a Curse, gain !M! Block.

dregsmod:Jealousy.NAME: Jealousy
dregsmod:Jealousy.DESCRIPTION: Cannot be removed from your deck. NL dregsmod:Seal a random Curse.

dregsmod:LashOut.NAME: Lash Out
dregsmod:LashOut.DESCRIPTION: Discard all Curses. Deal !D! Damage, plus !M! for each Curse discarded.

dregsmod:Curate.NAME: Curate
dregsmod:Curate.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Discard a card. If you discard a Curse, gain !B! Block.

dregsmod:IcyTouch.NAME: Icy Touch
dregsmod:IcyTouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If you're holding a Curse, channel a Frost Orb.

dregsmod:Improvise.NAME: Improvise
dregsmod:Improvise.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If you're holding a Curse, draw a card and dregsmod:Seal this card.

dregsmod:Plague.NAME: Plague
dregsmod:Plague.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable NL While dregsmod:Sealed, deal !M! Damage to all enemies each turn.

dregsmod:Ruin.NAME: Ruin
dregsmod:Ruin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If the target is dregsmod:Cursed, damage it again.

dregsmod:SharpShadows.NAME: Sharp Shadows
dregsmod:SharpShadows.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage for each other card in your hand.

dregsmod:Ascetic.NAME: Ascetic
dregsmod:Ascetic.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable NL While dregsmod:Sealed, gain !M! Mantra each turn.

dregsmod:Asylum.NAME: Asylum
dregsmod:Asylum.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, choose a card to dregsmod:Seal. You gain HP equal to its energy cost.

dregsmod:CursedScroll.NAME: Cursed Scroll
dregsmod:CursedScroll.DESCRIPTION: The target loses 2 Strength. Inflict !M! dregsmod:Cursed. NL Exhaust

dregsmod:Defiance.NAME: Defiance
dregsmod:Defiance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are inflicted with Weak, Frail, or Vulnerable, gain !M! Strength.

dregsmod:EmbraceDarkness.NAME: Embrace Darkness
dregsmod:EmbraceDarkness.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! dregsmod:Fortitude. If you're holding a Curse, channel a Dark Orb.

dregsmod:Excess.NAME: Excess
dregsmod:Excess.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse, draw !M! card.
dregsmod:Excess.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Curse, draw !M! cards.

dregsmod:Fear.NAME: Fear
dregsmod:Fear.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. dregsmod:Seal this card.

dregsmod:Glare.NAME: Glare
dregsmod:Glare.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you're holding a Curse, draw a card.

dregsmod:Guardian.NAME: Guardian
dregsmod:Guardian.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you seal this card, gain !M! Block.

dregsmod:HardLuck.NAME: Hard Luck
dregsmod:HardLuck.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Costs 1 less for each Curse in your deck.

dregsmod:Jinx.NAME: Jinx
dregsmod:Jinx.DESCRIPTION: Inflict X Vulnerable, Weak, and dregsmod:Cursed on an enemy.
dregsmod:Jinx.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Inflict X + 1 Vulnerable, Weak, and dregsmod:Cursed on an enemy.

dregsmod:Malediction.NAME: Malediction
dregsmod:Malediction.DESCRIPTION: dregsmod:Seal X random Curses. Deal !D! damage for each Curse sealed.

dregsmod:MidnightManacles.NAME: Midnight Manacles
dregsmod:MidnightManacles.DESCRIPTION: The target loses !M! Strength this turn.

dregsmod:Misfortune.NAME: Misfortune
dregsmod:Misfortune.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Can only be used if you're holding a Curse.

dregsmod:Obstruct.NAME: Obstruct
dregsmod:Obstruct.DESCRIPTION: If the target intends to Attack, inflict Weak and gain !M! dregsmod:Sturdiness.

dregsmod:Pinprick.NAME: Pinprick
dregsmod:Pinprick.DESCRIPTION: Inflict 2 Vulnerable. If you're holding a Curse, apply !M! *Mark. NL ALL enemies lose HP equal to their *Mark.

dregsmod:Unlucky.NAME: Unlucky
dregsmod:Unlucky.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Costs 1 less for each Curse in your deck.

dregsmod:ChaosTheory.NAME: Chaos Theory
dregsmod:ChaosTheory.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, add !M! copy of a random card from your master deck to your hand.

dregsmod:EclipseForm.NAME: Eclipse Form
dregsmod:EclipseForm.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable Curse cards can be played. When played, gain !M! Block and deal !M! Damage to all enemies.

dregsmod:Entropy.NAME: Entropy
dregsmod:Entropy.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable NL While this card is dregsmod:Sealed, gain !B! Block each turn.

dregsmod:LastHope.NAME: Last Hope
dregsmod:LastHope.DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Deal !D! Damage. Choose a card in your draw pile to move to the top. NL Exhaust

dregsmod:Incantation.NAME: Incantation
dregsmod:Incantation.DESCRIPTION: The first enemy you damage each turn is inflicted with !M! dregsmod:Cursed.

dregsmod:MeanLook.NAME: Mean Look
dregsmod:MeanLook.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Double the target's dregsmod:Cursed. NL Exhaust

dregsmod:Overcome.NAME: Overcome
dregsmod:Overcome.DESCRIPTION: Gain X dregsmod:Fortitude, dregsmod:Might, and dregsmod:Sturdiness.
dregsmod:Overcome.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain X + 1 dregsmod:Fortitude, dregsmod:Might, and dregsmod:Sturdiness.

dregsmod:Redemption.NAME: Redemption
dregsmod:Redemption.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Fatal: Permanently remove a random Curse from your deck. NL Exhaust

dregsmod:Retribution.NAME: Retribution
dregsmod:Retribution.DESCRIPTION: Each time you lose HP, your next attack deals !M! additional Damage.

dregsmod:Ritual.NAME: Ritual
dregsmod:Ritual.DESCRIPTION: Inflict !M! dregsmod:Cursed to all enemies. NL Exhaust

dregsmod:SeeNoEvil.NAME: See No Evil
dregsmod:SeeNoEvil.DESCRIPTION: dregsmod:Seal any number of cards in your draw pile.
dregsmod:SeeNoEvil.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL dregsmod:Seal any number of cards in your draw pile.

dregsmod:Catastrophe.NAME: Catastrophe
dregsmod:Catastrophe.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Inflict !M! dregsmod:Cursed to all enemies.

dregsmod:Doom.NAME: Doom
dregsmod:Doom.DESCRIPTION: Inflict !M! dregsmod:Cursed to the target. NL Exhaust

dregsmod:Gloom.NAME: Gloom
dregsmod:Gloom.DESCRIPTION: Inflict !M! dregsmod:Cursed to the target. NL Exhaust
